EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne Tour_PARENT_2018.Paris Reminder Nov 30 send
EmailTemplate.subject: See you Tuesday at SpringOne Tour!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We look forward to seeing you Thursday at SpringOne Tour Paris <[[https://springonetour.io/2018/paris?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-springonetour-paris-q418]]>. Please review the event details below and feel free to email the team at springonetour@pivotal.io <[[mailto:springonetour@pivotal.io]]> with any questions. Please be sure to bring your government-issued ID, like a driver's license, with you when you check in.

8:00 am

8:45 am

Reactive Spring with Spring Boot 2.0

Social & Networking at New Cap <[[http://newcap-eventcenter.com/]]>

Day Ends

Location New Cap Event Center <[[https://newcap-eventcenter.com/?lang=en]]> 3 Quai de Grenelle <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/New+Cap+Event+Center/@48.854249,2.2862883,17z/data=!4m13!1m7!3m6!1s0x47e6701cd21d7113:0xc1cf6aa60e1255e8!2s3+Quai+de+Grenelle,+75015+Paris,+France!3b1!8m2!3d48.854249!4d2.288477!3m4!1s0x47e6701cd21d7113:0x859d6549ba6955f3!8m2!3d48.8538487!4d2.2880604]]> 75015 Paris <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/New+Cap+Event+Center/@48.854249,2.2862883,17z/data=!4m13!1m7!3m6!1s0x47e6701cd21d7113:0xc1cf6aa60e1255e8!2s3+Quai+de+Grenelle,+75015+Paris,+France!3b1!8m2!3d48.854249!4d2.288477!3m4!1s0x47e6701cd21d7113:0x859d6549ba6955f3!8m2!3d48.8538487!4d2.2880604]]>
We look forward to seeing you on Tuesday! Tasha Isenberg and the SpringOne Tour Team
